duties_responsibilities.duty: Network operations, firewall, intrusion prevention and detection, internal/external network security

Server deployment/support/upgrade, desktop support, physical/VMware VDI deployment/support/upgrade, anti-virus support/mitigation, backup and recovery, WSUS support/testing/sandbox, VMware vSphere 6/7 management/support/upgrade, Office 365 management/support

Excellent communication skills – ability to articulate complex concepts in a clear/concise way, strategic planning, documentation and presentation skills, extreme attention to detail, research and document requirements of business users, understanding of organization’s goals and objectives, take ownership of assigned tasks, document network policies and procedures

Disaster recovery management and testing, time management, proactive issue mitigation, understanding business concerns and needs, commitment to superior customer service, communication of technical issues, operating in high pressure situations, hardware standards, system images, desktop and application virtualization, system patching, anti-virus/spyware, application packaging and system management tools
Research and test new technology, diagnose current technology problems, participate in on-call rotation, occasional travel within California, Arizona, and Nevada

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, or similar discipline; minimum six years technical experience in a desktop support/system administration environment; and/or training; and/or equivalent combination of education and experience.
